name: fullstack-saas-boilerplate
description: Full-stack SaaS marketing site with Astro frontend and Strapi backend

scripts.reset: pnpm run reset:db && pnpm run restart
scripts.reset:db: rm -rf backend/.tmp && rm -rf backend/build && rm -rf backend/dist
scripts.reset:hard: pnpm run reset:db && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf */node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.restart: pkill -f 'strapi develop' || true && pnpm run dev
scripts.backend:reset: cd backend && rm -rf .tmp build dist && pnpm strapi develop
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run reset:db && echo 'Setup complete! Run: pnpm dev'
scripts.demo:reset: pkill -f 'strapi develop' || true && rm -rf backend/.tmp && rm -rf backend/build && rm -rf backend/dist && rm -rf backend/public/uploads/* && cd backend && pnpm install
scripts.demo:start: echo '🌱 Starting with demo data...' && SEED_DATA=true pnpm run dev
scripts.demo:complete: echo '🚀 Setting up complete demo environment...' && pnpm run demo:reset && pnpm run demo:build && pnpm run demo:seed && echo '✅ Demo ready! Run: pnpm demo:start'
scripts.demo:build: echo '📦 Building backend for demo...' && cd backend && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.demo:seed: echo '🌱 Seeding demo data...' && node demo-seeder.cjs
scripts.demo:quick: echo '⚡ Quick demo setup (assumes backend is built)...' && pnpm run demo:seed && echo '✅ Demo data ready! Run: pnpm dev'
scripts.demo:verify: echo '🔍 Verifying demo data...' && node demo-verify.cjs
scripts.team:list: echo '📋 Listing pending team registrations...' && node list-pending-users.js
scripts.team:unblock: echo '🔓 Usage: pnpm team:unblock <email>' && echo 'Example: pnpm team:unblock john@example.com'
